mapper.insert: insert into ${table_prefix}player_home (home_id, home_name, player_uuid, location, show_material) values (#{serverHome.homeId}, #{serverHome.homeName},#{serverHome.playerUUID}, #{serverHome.location}, #{serverHome.showMaterial})

mapper.delete: delete from ${table_prefix}player_home where home_id = #{home_id} and player_uuid = #{playerUUID}
